programme.title: The Farmers Llamas
programme.desc: When the Farmer and Bitzer go to a country fair, Shaun the Sheep steals away with them, intent on causing mischief. There, Shaun spies an auction, where he sees three exotic and very crafty llamas going under the hammer.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun makes a wish that changes everything, with unexpected consequences.

programme.title: The Gruffalo
programme.desc: Animated film based on the classic childrens picture book written by Julia Donaldson and illustrated by Axel Scheffler. The film tells the magical tale of a mouse who takes a walk through the woods in search of a nut.

programme.title: The Gruffalos Child
programme.desc: One wild and windy night, the Gruffalos child ignores her fathers warnings and bravely tiptoes out into the snow in search of the Big Bad Mouse. She meets Snake, Owl and Fox but no sign of the fabled Mouse. He doesnt really exist - or does he?

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
programme.desc: In the 1970s, young Gru tries to join a group of supervillains called the Vicious 6 after they oust their legendary leader. When the interview turns disastrous, Gru and his Minions find themselves on the run with the Vicious 6 hot on their tails.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
programme.desc: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll when he learns that he has burnt through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

One fine day, he spots a pop-up book in an antique shop: the perfect present for his beloved aunts 100th birthday. When a thief steals the prized book, Paddington embarks on an epic quest to unmask the culprit before Aunt Lucys big celebration.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon is back in the hosts chair for a festive edition of the award-winning comedy panel show. And as ever, David Mitchell and Lee Mack are the lightning-quick team captains. Over the course of the show, a stellar cast of celebrity guests reveal amazing stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up? David Mitchell is joined by Jools Holland and Swarzy Shire, while Lee Mack is joined by Helen George and David Walliams.

Now a Viking leader, Hiccup finds himself increasingly attracted to Astrid, while his beloved dragon Toothless meets an enchanting creature who captures his eye. When the evil Grimmel launches a devious plan to wipe out all the dragons, Hiccup must unite both clans to find Caldera, a hidden land that holds the key to saving Toothless and his flying friends.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Grand Day Out
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit have run out of cheese and this provides an excellent excuse for the animated duo to take their holiday on the moon, where, as everyone knows, there is ample cheese.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Close Shave
programme.desc: Wallaces whirlwind romance with the proprietor of the local wool shop puts his head in a spin and Gromit is framed for sheep-rustling in a fiendish criminal plot.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit have opened a new bakery and business is booming, not least because a deadly Cereal Killer has murdered all the other bakers in town. Gromit is worried that they may be next but Wallace does not care as he has fallen in love.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Its been ten years since we last went to Billericay to spend Christmas with the Shipmans and the Wests.This year were off to Wales for the festivities, where Bryns cooking dinner for over thirteen people.

programme.title: Stuffed
programme.desc: The Farooqis have an unforgettable Christmas when a surprise bonus leads to a Lapland holiday, but things go downhill fast after a disastrous discovery.

programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and Andrew has failed to buy his daughters main present: the elusive Sparklehoof the Unicorn Princess. His over-friendly neighbour Dev manages to nab perhaps the last one in the UK online, but its 270 miles away.

programme.title: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, an LA detective is drawn into a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with an elite special forces unit whove seized a bustling airport in Washington, DC.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Ghosts Adam and Barbara try to scare off the new owners of their home with their new-found powers, but get more than they bargained for when the new family appear to enjoy being haunted. Desperate, the pair enlist the help of a demonic phantom, despite having been strongly advised against it.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: James is cursed with `acute misfortune syndrome. James tries to reconnect with his dad after being thrown out by his mum for setting fire to their house at a family barbecue. In this world, chronic bad luck exists and the unbelievable is the everyday.

programme.desc: Betty and Harry, two devoted scarecrows, plan the perfect wedding - until a rival threatens everything. A joyful tale of love, loyalty and what truly matters.

programme.desc: Martin heads to Cannock in Staffordshire to see a three-bed bungalow with a bizarre layout, taken on by a husband and wife who arent afraid to get their hands dirty. He also visits Alsager in Cheshire to see a three-bed semi with lots of space, its just in all the wrong places. And Martel is in Hartlepool, County Durham, to visit a two-bed terrace in need of modernisation.

programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents todays show from Ardingly Antiques Fair in West Sussex. Charlie also brings along a mysterious gadget, but can the locals guess what it might be?

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Briony May Williams is on her home turf in Somerset as she helps a couple with a budget of £500k swap their narrowboat for a more traditional house on terra firma. Briony also visits a market garden initiative that operates alongside a hostel for the homeless and rural rough sleepers.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A group of petty criminals plan to rig a major traffic jam to divert attention from their bank heist.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte is a would-be music business wheeler and dealer, and hes decided what Dublin needs is a top-shelf soul band. However, top-shelf soul musicians are hard to find in Dublin, so he has to make do with what he can find. Before long, the band, called the Commitments, is packing them in at local clubs. Do they have what it takes to make the big time?

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fishing crews on the Bering Sea endure mortal peril and intense discomfort during crab season, with 12-metre waves, 318-kilogram crab pots that can easily crush a careless crewman, and freezing temperatures around the clock.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Duane and Chad Ollinger return to Blind Frog Ranch, armed with cutting-edge tech, to unearth $3 billion in hidden treasure.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Searching for the hidden entrance to the cave system, the team uncovers an ancient vent shaft above the Energy Zone. But an explosion triggers an underground tsunami that threatens to flood the cave system.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: When an underground tsunami floods the cavern system, Duane and his team attempt to breach it from higher ground -- discovering evidence of Aztec artefacts and a crucial clue to the Lost Rhodes mine.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: After uncovering a bar of gold at the Bead Site, Chad and James set out to research where it might have come from. With trespassers still threatening the ranch, their discovery sets them on the path of the fabled Lost Rhodes Mine.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: The team tries a dangerous manoeuvre on the trail of the Lost Rhoades Mine to access the Mormon Eye cave. Back on the ranch, Duane discovers more poacher sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates investigates conspiracy theories, including new discoveries suggesting the Titanic was sunk by more than just an iceberg, the true story behind the death of Harry Houdini, and lost Civil War Gold that spawned a lawsuit against the FBI.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: In the summer of 2024, dozens of cameras captured a rare outbreak of shark attacks along Americas Gulf Coast. Told exclusively through first-hand accounts of victims and eyewitnesses, nobody has seen all these perspectives unfold in real time.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: With word of an urgent lead, Josh jets to Poland to join in the opening of a secret Nazi tunnel system dug into a dormant volcano. Josh helps a local team tear away a stone wall built by the Germans in the last days of World War 2.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: When Josh moves into a remote farmhouse, Tickle and the Laws help devise an underground transport operation.

programme.title: Massive Engineering Mistakes
programme.desc: When a new bridge suddenly collapses in Miami, several die in a horrifying calamity. Experts use the latest science to investigate what went wrong and how an innovative bridge-building technique could be to blame.

programme.title: Massive Engineering Mistakes
programme.desc: The construction of a new parking garage at a luxury waterside condo turns disastrous as it collapses in Jacksonville, Fla.; experts use the latest tech to investigate and uncover critical design flaws and unsupported lower levels.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Duane Ollinger sinks everything he has into hunting for what he believes is a vast fortune of gold on his property; with each step he takes closer to finding the treasure, the land appears to hold on tighter and stop him in his tracks.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: With an access tunnel to the underground cavern finally opened, and a tantalising clue discovered, Duanes son Chad takes a risky dive into the flooded cave system -- and what he finds defies all explanation.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: After a huge cargo ship suddenly vanishes with 27 crew members on board, new evidence suggests the culprit may be a mythical rogue wave.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew indulges his Georgian obsession in Lincoln, where he falls for a Regency wine cooler. And a bungalow near Stockport hides a vast collection.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew finds rare pieces that have stood the test of time. They include an 18th century cabinet in superb original condition and a chest from the Vatican.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Exploring Irelands thriving antiques world, Drew and new buying partner Alister uncover treasures in private homes and showrooms across the country.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew gets an insiders tour of Scotland with local dealer, Viki Knott. He discovers a Mackintosh-influenced chair and some sinister 1960s Americana.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. By combining new DNA technology with painstaking detective work, the mysteries of people with unknown beginnings who are desperate for answers can now be solved. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshires big country houses in a bid to help save and protect these northern gems for the future.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two women try to find missing parents after half a century apart. Ann found her birth mother over a decade ago, and now wants to locate her birth father, and Amanda is on the trail of her birth mother who gave her up for adoption in the 1960s.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Paula Stillie has always looked completely different from her white adoptive family in Scotland. Heartbreakingly, as a little girl she covered herself in talcum powder to try and look more like her parents. Lisa Harding grew up in the north east of England with her single mother Moyra, who worked long hours as a hairdresser by day and taxi driver by night. It was a lonely childhood and Lisa always wished for a sister.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: When Steve Coogan is commissioned by the food supplement of a Sunday newspaper to review half a dozen restaurants, he plans a trip around the north of England with his food loving American girlfriend. When his girlfriend decides to leave him and return to the States, Steve calls Rob Brydon, the only person he can think of who will be available to step in. Their first stop is the Inn at Whitewell in the Trough of Bowland.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon enjoy a taster menu at LEnclume in Cartmel.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob stay at Coleridges old home, Greta Hall, in Keswick. They visit Dove Cottage and lunch at Holbeck Ghyll.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: For their fourth meal together, Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon are at Hipping Hall.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit the world famous Malham limestone pavement, before eating at the Yorke Arms.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Bolton Abbey and breakfast at The Angel at Hetton. On their way back home to London they stop off at Steves parents house.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob begin the trip in Piemonte at the Trattoria Della Posta before stopping at Byrons house in Genova on their way to the Cenobio dei Dogi in Camogli.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Rob and Steve go on a boat trip run by local resident Lucy, who takes them to a local restaurant. They visit Percy Shelleys house for a picture before continuing their journey that eventually leads them to another restaurant.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Viareggio in Tuscany where Shelleys body was washed ashore, and they have lunch at Trattoria Albana.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Rob and Steve arrive in Rome where they meet Steves assistant Emma and the photographer Yolanda. Together they visit the Keats museum, and have lunch at Ristorante Oliver Glowig.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Pompeii and then have lunch at Relais Blu on the Sorrento coast overlooking the isle of Capri.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob are joined by Steves son Joe and his assistant Emma. They sail from Naples to Capri where they have lunch at Il Riccio.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Court composer Antonio Salieri is shaken: In 1781, the brilliant free spirit Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart comes to Vienna and competes with him. Salieri decides to destroy him.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Mozart is in conflict with his father, who disapproves of his sons marriage to the commoner Constanze. Meanwhile, Salieri is despairing over his own mediocrity.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Mozart struggles for recognition in Vienna, while Salieri schemes and tries to prevent the premiere of The Marriage of Figaro. Constanze meets the music teacher Franz.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Mozart falls into financial trouble, loses his last pupil, and moves with his family to the outskirts of the city. After his fathers death, Mozart processes his feelings in Don Giovanni.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Salieri relentlessly pressures the sick Mozart to complete the Requiem he commissioned. Meanwhile, the performances of The Magic Flute are enjoying great success.

programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him recover a 500-year-old fortune. What starts out as a heist becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Santiago Moncada can get his hands on it.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: The film crew for a nature documentary on a legendary tribe of the area is hijacked by Sarone, a madman intent on capturing the biggest snake in the Amazon, but since reptiles dont grow to 40 feet without eating, whos hunting whom?

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: As the search to find a rare flower in the jungles of Borneo gets underway, the situation deteriorates rapidly. First infighting amongst the research team breaks out but soon they have a problem which unites them; there is a very large and very hungry snake present.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him recover a 500-year-old fortune. What starts out as a heist becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Santiago Moncada can get his hands on it.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: The film crew for a nature documentary on a legendary tribe of the area is hijacked by Sarone, a madman intent on capturing the biggest snake in the Amazon, but since reptiles dont grow to 40 feet without eating, whos hunting whom?

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: As the search to find a rare flower in the jungles of Borneo gets underway, the situation deteriorates rapidly. First infighting amongst the research team breaks out but soon they have a problem which unites them; there is a very large and very hungry snake present.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. They disguise themselves as dumb white socialites Brittany and Tiffany Wilson, the heiresses to a hotel fortune who are under threat. Gross-out comedic farce from the makers of `Scary Movie.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A crazy Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a race against time when three hung-over groomsmen awaken after a night of drunken debauchery to find that the groom has gone missing, and attempt to get him to the alter in time for his wedding.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance, a married couple buckle under the pressure when a Hollywood actress meets them to do research for a film about their past.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: A Minecraft Movie
programme.desc: A mysterious portal pulls four misfits into the Overworld, a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To get back home, theyll have to master the terrain while embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected crafter named Steve.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes on a quest to discover a stolen recipe that takes him to our world, where he tangles with a pirate.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: The Witches

programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Sinners
programme.desc: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their Mississippi hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: Two teens uncover a centuries-old secret when they decide to watch a zombie movie on Halloween night. However, when the townspeople themselves turn into the undead, they must track down an infamous filmmaker and break the curse before its too late.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb is is an absolute pro at stealing ideas from peoples minds during the dream state but now he is being challenged to perform the reverse: plant an idea in the mind of a target. The ultimate in corporate espionage, and much is at stake if Dom cant pull it off.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Drop

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.sub-title: When All Is Said And Done

programme.desc: Brothers Barry, Maurice and Robin Gibb find early fame in the 1960s and go on to write over 1,000 songs, including 20 No. 1 hits. This film follows the groups meteoric rise as they navigate the complexities of working so intimately alongside family.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Former nurse-turned-exotic animal broker Tonia Haddix fights to retain custody of her "kids", seven chimpanzees at the Missouri Primate Foundation; other chimp mums are introduced, including one who raised a baby chimpanzee alongside her daughter.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: PETA launches an investigation after a former Hollywood chimp named Tonka goes missing; its a high-stakes legal battle, particularly in light of a brutal attack that happened years earlier when another chimp nearly killed a Connecticut woman.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Actor Alan Cumming, who also has a special relationship with Tonka, adds $10,000 to a reward for Tonkas whereabouts, and the film crew faces an ethical dilemma as parallels are drawn to a previous PETA case that took a dangerous turn in Oregon.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Tonkas fate becomes clearer while Tonia struggles to let go and dreams of one day opening her own island sanctuary where she can live among chimpanzees.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Vegas Ladies discover that one of them has Texas flair, Kenny lucks out looking for lady stuff, and Mary gets the spring back in her step.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Secrets of the Lost Ark

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: South Africas Drakensberg is one of the continents most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. A glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: There are clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. There is a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound and a honey badgers dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: In order to avoid predators, animals are bound to apply mimicry, poison and other methods to save themselves from danger.

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: In their struggle for survival, underwater creatures have evolved for various niches and environments and to adapt both defensive and offensive skills.

programme.title: Boss Shark: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Witness a shark competition unlike any other, where great whites go head-to-head in jaw-dropping tests of strength. Risk it all with shark specialist Dr. Riley Elliott as he tries to answer an age-old question: Which sex reigns supreme?

programme.title: Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: David begins his journey inside the magnificent Palm House, a unique global rainforest in London.

programme.title: Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the secret life of plants at Kew, examining everything from a huge underground specimen to a snappy carnivorous variety.

programme.title: Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: David Attenborough concludes his absorbing journey around Londons Kew Gardens, as he discovers how some plants have evolved to shed their dependency on water enabling them to survive in the driest environments.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: As Alison collects a female marmoset whose owner has died, the squirrel monkeys try a new puzzle and Xingus baby ventures outside for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Capuchin Matty needs a visit from the vet after fighting leader Erico for the top spot, and the birth of a baby woolly monkey is captured on camera.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Theres big news for one of the chimp groups, and rescued marmoset Jangles summons up the courage to join her new mate Reggie in the outside enclosure.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Vet Nic Masters uses high tech diagnostic equipment to examine health issues in some of the parks smaller primates, including capuchin Louis and patas monkey Penelope.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The primate care staff move more than thirty capuchins in a day, the chimps react to a fallen tree and the guenons finally get to try out their revamped home.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bryan has a trip to the dentist to remove a rotten molar, and Lee Butler returns to Vietnam to assess repairs needed at Monkey Worlds sister sanctuary.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough charts the story of animals who defy gravity, starting with the planets first flyers: the insect.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: After meeting some critters who glide through life in Borneo, Sir David Attenborough decides to turn back the clock.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: In the final episode in the series, Sir David Attenborough turns his attention to the creatures that dominate our skies today.

programme.title: Attenborough At 90: Behind the Lens
programme.desc: In celebration of Sir David Attenboroughs 90th Birthday, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

programme.title: A David Attenborough Special
programme.desc: On his 89th birthday, David Attenborough talks about his career, his recent record-breaking dive on the Great Barrier Reef and issues facing the natural world today.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves at night in the state of the art Triton submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals that built the reef and helped to turn it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David continues his exploration of the Great Barrier Reef, aboard the research vessel the Alucia. He discovers the incredible animals that visit the reef every year, from birds to whales, some travelling thousands of kilometres to get there.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David examines what the next few decades hold for this remarkable community of animals, as well as what is being done to save it.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: The Bachelor King
programme.desc: David Attenborough takes a birds-eye view in this spectacular documentary, charting the king penguins attempts to survive, find love and raise a family in the unforgiving Antarctic.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Right beneath our feet is a secret world of disguise and espionage, social networking and courtship, rape and pillage, parenthood and relationships. Sir David Attenborough investigates how macroscopic residents outwit their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Its a bug-eating world out there, and the documentary continues with a look at how the various critters disable the defences of their respective prey.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Dating is just as tricky a business in the insect world, and Sir David Attenborough finds out how certain bugs choose and then woo their partners.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough reveals how different bugs usher in the next generation, including the butterfly and harvestman spider.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Join Sir David Attenborough as he zooms in on a set of bugs who prefer co-operation to conflict. Features the likes of the burrowing cockroach and the queen bee.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough takes a tour of the insect worlds vast colonies, which rival human megacities in terms of size and complexity.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal the story of the vertebrates, from their humble origins as the primitive fish that once swam in ancient seas, to their radical move onto land and beyond.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal how mammals developed from tiny forest dwellers to become the dominant life form on the planet.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest audio technology, David Attenborough explores the crucial role of sound in nature, examining how it shapes and influences the everyday lives of animals, from communication to their behaviour and decisions.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: From melodic songs to strange hums, David Attenborough sets out to discover the sounds that gibbons, lyrebirds, bull elk, and more use to find a mate and warn off the competition.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough follows baby animals as they communicate in their quest for survival, using sound to beg and call for help in the vulnerable early days of life in the natural world.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The team are faced with one of the most dangerous threats they have ever come across - a flesh-eating fungus that turns its victims into human shells intent only on spreading the fungus further. programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: When Christine Johnson and the military invade the ARC, the team are forced to flee. programme.title: Primeval

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The team are faced with one of the most dangerous threats they have ever come across - a flesh-eating fungus that turns its victims into human shells intent only on spreading the fungus further. It takes over any person who comes into contact with it, and it proves resistant to everything the team can throw at it.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: When Christine Johnson and the military invade the ARC, the team are forced to flee. They take refuge in an abandoned 1930s cabin in the woods, but it is not long before danger appears in the form of vicious Pliocene-era phorusrhacids or `terror birds. Finding themselves besieged by the creatures, the team have nothing but their ingenuity and their bare hands to help them survive.

programme.title: Primeval

programme.desc: A girl on her way back from a rock concert blew a tyre on her truck. The police found the vehicle, but no trace of her. Three years later, they made a grisly discovery.

programme.desc: An elderly couple were bludgeoned to death in their home, with no suspects found. Years later, a pawn shop owner made a chance discovery that led directly to the killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a nine year old girl was taken from her home and murdered, forensic scientists uncovered a trail to a suspect who was the same man who anonymously called 911.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The disappearance of a young woman leads police to a man with a criminal history, but with no body, there can be no arrest until they discover a charred tooth.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: We follow the 35-hour build of a new Land Rover Defender, where over 3300 individual parts and 70 years of innovation come together to create a vehicle for any terrain: river or mountain, jungle or desert.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: Factory 56, a brand new facility in Germany, opens its doors as we follow the ultimate configuration of a £120,000 Mercedes-Benz S-Class, from the chassis build to the main assembly floor.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek checks out an abandoned 1985 Renault 4 and an MGB Roadster that hasnt seen the light of day for 36 years, and Jack heads to Rotherham to pick up a pair of rare Bond Bugs.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Northumberland to collect a rare 1975 NSU RO 80, Jack draws the short straw again with a Mini Mayfair stuck in a barn, and an Aston Martin DBS husk is auctioned.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: After Hitlers initial territorial gains in Russia, the relentless advance of the Wehrmacht is decisively stopped at Stalingrad. For the first time in the war, the Nazis suffer heavy losses in what will later be regarded as one of the decisive turning points of the conflict.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The German attempts to starve Britain by attacking ships bringing supplies from North America are very nearly successful. Many tonnes of shipping are sunk and many lives are lost to U-Boat attacks. Defeat in the Atlantic would surely mean the end of the war for the Allies.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the Scarborough Spa Pavilion for another busy day. Cameras hone in on objects ranging from a silver reliquary found in the rubble of a building site, a paperweight from Churchills desk given in gratitude after the nursing of his wife Lady Clementine, and a sparkling tiara which brings the house down with its beauty and value.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return to perhaps the most unusual venue to host the show - the active jet base of RAF Marham in Norfolk. Fiona Bruce and the team welcome a large turnout of visitors bringing family treasures. Objects and owners featured include a priest with a statue of Buddha, and the great-great-grandson of eminent architect Pugin bringing objects from his familys past.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek, with help from the Mathewson clan, drag a mini pickup out of the barn where its been for 20 years, and a 350cc Douglas Mark V motorbike from 1950 goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Four VW camper vans pitch up at the auction house looking for a new home and Derek picks up an Austin 16 that goes like stink and has some unusual modern modifications.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Tropical rainforests cover just 3 per cent of our planet yet are home to a huge 50 per cent of the worlds species. They are the richest environments on earth but also the most competitive. Travelling through this enchanted world we uncover the amazing strategies the inhabitants adopt in order to survive. Look out for the flying frog mating orgy and the sinister bodysnatching Cordyceps fungi that eat their victims alive.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates the epic journey of a humpback whale and calf as they cross the richest seas that fringe our coasts. From tropical paradises, where the newborn calf takes his first faltering breaths, to the storm-ravaged icy polar seas, the whales great feeding grounds, seas of great contrast and surprise are revealed.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Monsieur Alphonse is mortally insulted that Edith would chose Rene over him and challenges Rene to a duel with pistols.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: The Colonel, Captain and Rene are captured and taken to the dungeons of the chateau, where Herr Flick awaits them.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: When the Communist Resistance steals the Fallen Madonna, Rene is ordered to pay the ransom. To make his life even more difficult, he is ordered to steal a vintage plane.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor and Margaret visit their solicitor to discuss a separation. Then what starts out as a routine trip to the Sainsburys cake counter ends with Victor employing a packet of coconut meringues to ward off an unfriendly pit bull terrier.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: The long-suffering Margaret comes into some money and Victor helps a young Dutch girl to get back on her feet. To add to the usual mayhem, the builders arrive to embark on a loft conversion.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Margaret tries to organise an unlikely love affair after Victor takes to the road, and a disaster of truly biblical proportions descends when the Meldrews are invited to Ronnie and Mildreds for the evening. In addition, a visit to the dentist goes horribly wrong.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek journeys to Essex to collect Pete Woods Austin Allegro, which has been sitting in an aircraft hangar at Audley End for 20 years.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Jacks off to East Yorkshire for an iconic 80s motor, where a Ford enthusiast is thinning out his herd of nine Escorts.
